title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7004.5 - Restrictions on correspondence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7004.5 - Restrictions on correspondence

State Regulations

Nothing contained in this Part shall be deemed to prevent
the chief administrative officer from establishing a list of correspondents
whom prisoners shall be prohibited from corresponding with. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7004.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
